title: Love Poems and Sentiments from the Heart
description: Love Poems and Sentiments from the Heart is a collection of poetry and affirmations about love; whether it be new love, lost love, being in love or the hope of love. It is truly inspirational love poetry. If you are thinking of ways to convey your love to another, you may very well find inspiration in this heart-felt collection. May your heart be filled with warmth and your spirit uplifted as you read through this book of sentiments.
author: Darren G. Burton
